## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fc8cb7c85f580c66397adec583bbd6623eafcb98683fcf6299ca73188892009f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'auth0-lock-webpack' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
